Articles.Content:
I installed a bunch of my fav mods and my game now randomly crashes during a flight. The timing seems random since ive had flights that where 1 minute until crash all the way to 15 minutes to crash.

Here is the part of the log where it crashes. If you need the entire log file or any of the others i can upload it to google drive or something.

Spoiler


[Toolbar] [INFO] loading settings (game scene: FLIGHT)
 
(Filename: C:/buildslave/unity/build/artifacts/generated/common/runtime/UnityEngineDebugBindings.gen.cpp Line: 42)

[Toolbar] [INFO] loading toolbar settings (toolbar 'toolbar_1863482750')
 
(Filename: C:/buildslave/unity/build/artifacts/generated/common/runtime/UnityEngineDebugBindings.gen.cpp Line: 42)

[Toolbar] [INFO] button visibilities have changed
 
(Filename: C:/buildslave/unity/build/artifacts/generated/common/runtime/UnityEngineDebugBindings.gen.cpp Line: 42)

(Filename: C:/buildslave/unity/build/artifacts/generated/common/runtime/UnityEngineDebugBindings.gen.cpp Line: 42)

[Toolbar] [INFO] saving settings (game scene: FLIGHT)
 
(Filename: C:/buildslave/unity/build/artifacts/generated/common/runtime/UnityEngineDebugBindings.gen.cpp Line: 42)

[Toolbar] [INFO] saving toolbar settings (toolbar 'toolbar_1863482750')
 
(Filename: C:/buildslave/unity/build/artifacts/generated/common/runtime/UnityEngineDebugBindings.gen.cpp Line: 42)

[CHATR] Capcom starts the exchange...
 
(Filename: C:/buildslave/unity/build/artifacts/generated/common/runtime/UnityEngineDebugBindings.gen.cpp Line: 42)

Crash!!!
SymInit: Symbol-SearchPath: '.;E:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Kerbal Space Program;E:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Kerbal Space Program;C:\WINDOWS;C:\WINDOWS\system32;SRV*C:\websymbols*http://msdl.microsoft.com/download/symbols;', symOptions: 530, UserName: 'Aaron'
OS-Version: 10.0.14393 () 0x300-0x1
 

Mod i have installed

kos

janitors closet

b9 aero

chatter

KAS

comm resource 

all the near future

kerbal engineer

SCANsat
The full log would be preferable. The symptoms sound like memory issues because you use the 32bit exe instead of the 64bit one.

10 hours ago, Harry Rhodan said:

The full log would be preferable. The symptoms sound like memory issues because you use the 32bit exe instead of the 64bit one.

https://drive.google.com/open?id=0BwgMhhxyXJ2_bnhaSjFGMHEwRXM

Here is the full log.

Also i check x64 on steam when i start ksp. I'll try starting from the exe instead.
